title: Script font name please
content:
Hi, I'm looking for the name of this font used in "America". It almost looks handwritten but not sure. Any help is appreciated.

Thanks,

Chris

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725123250im_/http:/typophile.com/files/depositphotos_24079573-USA-Icons_3796.jpg)
author: Relevant Logo
